column4: hi. how do you create a new user from a live cd on a ubuntu 9.10 installation? i tried, but get "Authentication failed." when rebooting and trying to actually log in with the newly created user. forgot password for the old one.
you are trying to add a user on a system you do not have sudo permission for?
is that...unrealistic? i mean, on an older system it would just ve worked with chrooting and a simple "adduser", on the livecd.
